Basic

Create a new Background by passing the source image URL at initialization:

javascript $(".target").background({ source: "http://example.com/image.jpg" });

```markup

...

```

Responsive

Create a responsive-friendly Background by defining key/value pairs containing the min-width image URLs:

javascript $(".target").background({ source: { "0px": "http://example.com/image-small.jpg", "980px": "http://example.com/image-large.jpg" } });

HTML5 Video

Create a video Background by defining proper browser-specific source video URLs, as well as a poster image URL:

javascript $(".target").background({ source: { poster: "http://example.com/poster.jpg", webm: "http://example.com/video.webm", mp4: "http://example.com/video.mp4", ogg: "http://example.com/video.ogv" } });

YouTube Video

Create a YouTube video Background by passing the YouTube embed URL as the source. If you do not define a poster, the YouTube thumbnail will be used:

javascript $(".target").background({ source: { poster: "http://example.com/poster.jpg", video: "//www.youtube.com/embed/VIDEO_ID" } });
